CustomField.description: Field used on Planners to show color coding.
CustomField.formula: IF(pse__Is_Billable__c , "lightBlue", IF( NOT(pse__Is_Billable__c) && ISPICKVAL(pse__Project__r.pse__Project_Type__c, "Customer Project"), "lightGreen", IF( ISPICKVAL(pse__Project__r.pse__Project_Type__c, "Paid Time Off"), "Pink", "")))
CustomField.label: Planner Color
